response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration, I am offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its true worth and provides you with an excellent investment opportunity. I am confident that this product will meet your needs and expectations. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can arrange the details promptly. I look forward to the possibility of doing business with you.", "product_price": 950000}
